CustomField.formula: IF(AND(( Next_SLA_End__c - now() ) * 24 * 60>0,( Next_SLA_End__c - now() ) * 24 * 60<20),'üëÄ', IF(OR( AND(ISPICKVAL(Status,'Pending'), FLOOR( MOD( (now() - LastModifiedDate) * 24, 24 ) ) >16 ) ),'üü°',IF(OR( AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(Status,'New'),ISPICKVAL(Status,'Response Received')),SLA_Breached__c) ),'‚è∞',IF(ISPICKVAL(Priority,'VIP'),'ü•á',''))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Cases stay in Pending status for more than 16 Hours.
CustomField.label: Case Age Issue Indicator
